Reborn 3–{6}{B}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with three additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
Whenever Crag Tyrant attacks, if it’s reborn, defending player sacrifices three permanents.
